Dreamer Zheng stands between Sabalenka and second Australian OpenAryna Sabalenka has blown all-comers off court on her march to the final of the Australian Open and China's Zheng Qinwen will need to produce something extraordinary to deprive her of back-to-back titles on Rod Laver Arena on Saturday. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 07:21:59 GMT 2JIIJ4X3BNLEVMVK3VZZ2VWI6E https://www.reuters.com/sports/tennis/dreamer-zheng-stands- Between-sabalenka-second-australian-open-2024-01-26/Reuters运动的网球
Explainer: Evergrande's possible liquidation and what happens nextA key offshore bondholder group of China Evergrande plans to join a petition to liquidate the developer at a hearing in a Hong Kong court on Monday, Reuters reported this week. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 06:14:46 GMT N4LBAEWGXNMOZJ4WVYPW2USFIU https://www.reuters.com/business/evergreen-possible-liquidation-what-happens-next-2024-01-26/,商业
Dubai's property boom shows signs of fizzling outAs cranes speckle the Dubai skyline and ultra-luxury homes change hands at record prices, signs that the city-state's property boom is fizzling out are coming into view. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 06:11:02 GMT 5O2QQZ5CWJOWPFCYA6JKIFGCAM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/dubais-property-boom-shows-signs-fizzling-out-2024-01-26/Sinead Cruise, Iain Withers, Hadeel Sayegh市场宏观问题
Chinese provinces target modest 2024 growth after missing previous goalsMany provinces in China including the financial hub of Shanghai have set modest 2024 economic growth targets after missing their previous goals, in a sign that a nationwide recovery to pre-pandemic levels would yet again prove elusive this year. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 06:04:15 GMT DYJLKSQCY5LNZNKJYLCE47BDL4 https://www.reuters.com/world/china/chinese-provinces-target-modest-2024-growth-after-missing-previous-goals-2024-01-26/Ellen Zhang, Ryan Woo市场宏观问题
Climate threatened Tuvalu holds election watched by Taiwan, ChinaVoting began on Friday in the tiny Pacific Island nation of Tuvalu in a national election that is being closely watched by China, Taiwan, the US and its ally Australia, amid a tussle for influence in the region. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 03:06:51 GMT FQ27W2CL7NM2RGHFLZ7L5OWSCQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/climate-threatened-tuvalu-holds-election-watched-by-taiwan-china-2024-01-26/Kirsty Needham世界亚太地区
Former Credit Suisse APAC asset management head exiting UBS - sourcesFormer asset management head of Credit Suisse in Asia Pacific, Min Huang, is leaving UBS as the bank embarks on reviewing its China business post global leadership changes, three sources with knowledge of the matter said. Fri, 26 Jan 2024 02:37:47 GMT OLI6ZHSUCVJQFMUWHRYZSSUCKA https://www.reuters.com/business/finance/former-credit-switzerland-apac-asset-management-head-exiting-ubs-sources-2024-01-26/Selena Li, Yu Xie商业金融
